data.title: Dead Space™ – EA Official Site
data.meta_description: The sci-fi survival horror classic Dead Space™ returns January 27, 2023, completely rebuilt to offer an even more immersive experience – including visual, audio, and gameplay improvements while staying faithful to the original game’s thrilling vision.
